app.name: Events Viewer App
app.short_description: View, filter & search users Sunshine Events.
app.long_description: The Events Viewer App is a Zendesk App that allows agents to view all Sunshine user events related to a user in a timeline. The app can be set to filter events by keywords, and lets agents search through or sort events, and view the attributes of a specific event on the ticket or the user's profile.

event_default_description.label: Default event description
event_default_description.helpText: Will be used if event doesn't have a decription

keywords.label: Event Keywords
keywords.helpText: Enter comma-separated keywords to show only events related to those keywords
